thread.title: Government Ethics Chief Says Trump’s Conflict-of-Interest Plan Isn’t Good Enough
thread.title_full: Government Ethics Chief Says Trump’s Conflict-of-Interest Plan Isn’t Good Enough - Washington Wire - WSJ

author: Peter Nicholas
title: Government Ethics Chief Says Trump’s Conflict-of-Interest Plan Isn’t Good Enough
text: Walter Shaub isn’t a household name. But the director of the obscure U.S. Office of Government Ethics is showing he isn’t afraid of a potential collision with President-elect Donald Trump. Hours after Mr. Trump unveiled a plan to guard against conflicts of interest, Mr. Shaub gave a speech denouncing the proposal as inadequate.
